102  if (this == &other) {
103  return *this;
104  }

106  Unload();
107  set(other);

121  inline ::Vector2 GetSize() const {
122  return {static_cast<float>(width), static_cast<float>(height)};
123  }
124 
128  void Load(const ::Image& image) {
129  set(::LoadTextureFromImage(image));
130  if (!IsReady()) {
131  throw RaylibException("Failed to load Texture from Image");
132  }
133  }
134 
138  void Load(const ::Image& image, int layoutType) {
139  set(::LoadTextureCubemap(image, layoutType));
140  if (!IsReady()) {
141  throw RaylibException("Failed to load Texture from Cubemap");
142  }
143  }
144 
148  void Load(const std::string& fileName) {
149  set(::LoadTexture(fileName.c_str()));
150  if (!IsReady()) {
151  throw RaylibException("Failed to load Texture from file: " + fileName);
152  }
153  }

159  ::UnloadTexture(*this);
160  }

337 
343  bool IsReady() const {
344  return id != 0;
345  }
346 
347  private:
348  void set(const ::Texture& texture) {
349  id = texture.id;
350  width = texture.width;
351  height = texture.height;
352  mipmaps = texture.mipmaps;
353  format = texture.format;
354  }
355 };
